title: Bitcoin
description: Bitcoin (BTC) is a cryptocurrency, a virtual currency designed to act as money and a form of payment outside the control of any one person, group, or entity, thus removing the need for third-party involvement in financial transactions.

title: Ethereum
description: Ethereum is a decentralized blockchain platform that establishes a peer-to-peer network that securely executes and verifies application code, called smart contracts.

title: Litecoin
description: Litecoin is a peer-to-peer (P2P) virtual currency, which means it is not governed by a central authority.

title: USD-T
description: Key Takeaways. Tether (USDT) is a stablecoin, a type of cryptocurrency pursuing a steady valuation.
